column5: The contract for the provision of HMRC Contact Centre telephony expired on 30 June 2013.  An extension of the contract has been approved for a maximum period of up to 2 years to allow completion of procurement of a replacement service and safe transition to the new service which is the focus for this expenditure.
Significant cost reductions exception handling across the Personal Tax Directorate.delivering a more seamless and efficient service to mass market customers.
